replies.body: The PBE where they're "nerfing" electrocute by buffing it?

How is it being buffed? Damage is halved.

The idea is to gut free burst damage. It will be more like thunderlord's decree, but harder to trigger.
Damage less than halved and up more than twice as often. The uptime now basically equals the cooldowns of assassins. Now it ensures they win not only battles of burst, but battles of poke as well!
